title: Call waiting issue
content:
I'm not getting call waiting notification when I'm in other call.
I checked 'Call settings > Additional settings'
There it's showing call waiting option is disabled. After 10-15 sec, it's getting enabled. Again when checked it's disabled and after 10-15 secs, it's enabled. But always call waiting notification not working on my Pixel 4a device.

Let me know if you are expecting any more details to fix this issue
